website_summaries.verdict: The BlackBerry Q10 is a great phone for QWERTY diehards and e-mail addicts, but anyone who doesn't need a physical keyboard should skip it.
pros: The BlackBerry Q10 boasts a superb physical keyboard, the latest BlackBerry OS (version 10.1), smooth performance, and long battery life
cons: The BlackBerry Q10’s screen is small
Its camera is average, not exceptional
BlackBerry 10’s learning curve is long and its app selection trails behind those of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite B-berry, all time
customer_reviews.text: I desperately wanted a 2nd Q10 for back-up. I've always used B-berries, and don't ever want to be without one. This is my favorite B-berry, all time. I hate I-phones. Would NEVER fork out the outrageous fees for one. And I want a phone for business and making calls. I have no interest in a hand-held lap-top. Social networks to me are completely insignificant. I don't care what anyone else is doing, and I certainly have no interest in sharing what I'm doing, with anyone. LOVE the Q10. Thank-you.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel C Coffin

customer_reviews.title: A new-in-the-box, unoepened, AT&T Logo-branded (on the bottom) yet fully-unclocked Blackberry Q10 Model Number SQN100-1
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this phone in April 2018. I received a new-in-the-box, unoepened, AT&T Logo-branded (on the bottom) yet fully-unclocked Blackberry Q10 Model Number SQN100-1 with Blackberry OS 10.2.1 installed. I used Blackberry Link for Windows to upgrade to the latest Blackberry 10.3 OS which includes the Amazon App store. It works great! Nice little phone, the camera is also pretty good. I also bought a little leather slide pouch for holding it in your pocket or purse. Signal / Telegram also work on this phone but require some creative installation work (downloading APK's from unsigned sources).
customer_reviews.author: Z Brock

customer_reviews.title: Good except for audio when I record a video
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long to record a video, and when I did, I realized that the audio won't work. The phone is great otherwise. I love my Blackberry, but I'm sorry I didn't check EVERYTHING when I first received it. I thought it was too late to leave a review, but here I am reviewing other purchases and have the opportunity now. The phone is good except for the audio which will cost me at least $100 to repair per "U Break, I Fix."
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back due to scratches on the screen...
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked good and the price was right ($65) so I set up the phone and when I felt everything was good, I finally pealed off the protective screen plastic film only to find 2 large scratches on the glass. I've had my other Q10 for 2 years and have never scratched the glass, but this one looks like someone used a rock instead of there finger. Upon further inspection, the sticker on the inside of the battery compartment does not look factory and is full of ridges and bubbles. If this was a return and they had it apart, it's beyond me why the didn't replace the screen. I saw nothing about this being a refirb. Sending it back...
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: this seller is a con
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd blackberry from this seller in under 2 months. They continue to send devices that are clearly not new. The first one, the screen blitzed out. The second one only turns on when attached to a wall cord. Just this morning, the replacement for that arrived, and it had fingerprints on the back of it, the the battery wasn't in a new bag. It was tossed in the box loosy goosy. I'm eager to find another peddler of blackberries that aren't a complete con.
customer_reviews.author: Girlchez

customer_reviews.title: I traded my Q10 for an iPhone 7. Best move ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a die hard bb user for the last 15 years. All has been ok until I got this phone. It has poor reception, no wi fi calling, bb has hardly any apps, poor touch screen. I decided to get an iPhone 7 to replace this useless piece of junk. OMG. What a difference. To q10 users, try an iPhone. I guarantee you will NEVER go back to a bb. BlackBerry used to have good phones, that’s why I stayed with them so long. Not so much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: This phone is the smoothest and nicest phone I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the smoothest and nicest phone I have ever used especially after using many. I have even used a rim phone before and it was okay but this Q10 is really top of the line to anything now on the market in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Phone wont turn on or charge
customer_reviews.text: What a total rip off! clearly the phone was not not brand new as advertised. Totally refurbished!! Imagine my shock when I saw the T Mobile front and a Verizon back cover... Not to mention no headphones or accessories either. Worse still, the battery / phone wouldn't charge or turn on at all....COMPLETELY USELESS!!! If I knew this was what I would get for a $200 phone, I would have saved myself the trouble and just tied 2 paper cups to a piece of string instead! Err...No thank you! I'm returning it and demanding my full refund!!
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Q10 is better than the Classic
customer_reviews.text: I am sending my BlackBerry Classic back and using the Q10. The Q10 is easier to hold, weights much less, uses the same processor and OS, and cost less than 1/2 the classic. The classic is huge for someone coming from a Perl and Curve. I think the Classic is a good phone (the optical mouse button is too small and inset too much compared to a curve - difficult to use) and would be perfect for someone coming from a iPhone or Galaxy and going back to a keyboard. You can't really one hand a Classic but you can with a Q10, and I have large hands (i can palm a basketball). Love the Q10.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: BLACKBERRY: A PC KEYBOARD WILL SAVE YOUR COMPANY!
customer_reviews.text: There is no physical keyboard in the universe as pleasant as typing on a Blackberry. If ever they go out of business, so will the best keyboard. If Blackberry made a similar keyboard for the PC, EVERYONE IN THE WORLD WOULD BUY ONE. It needn't have all the extra keys--just the ability to do basic typing. ARE YOU LISTENING BLACKBERRY? A PC KEYBOARD WILL SAVE YOUR COMPANY!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Spicyweiner

customer_reviews.title: Although the phone is WiFi capable...
customer_reviews.text: The carriers don't support the capability. So, the phone is not able to do the very thing I bought it for. At least it still has the qwerty keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Cymbeline

customer_reviews.title: Not Unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my husband, as a gift. After reading the description, I was under the impression that the phone was unlocked and all I needed to do was put in my sim card. This is not the case. The phone will not connect to our T-Mobile network. The phone appears to be an AT&T phone, and only shows AT&T as an available network. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana M. Kirkham

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to hold 5
customer_reviews.text: 1. the phone appears new 2. it works well no issues 3. reception is iffy, but all our phones here are now (ATT tower is 1.5 mi away no buildings or hills 4. comfortable to hold 5. easy on the pants pocket getting in and out 6, and should be one, it's a blackberry qwerty os 10 7. battery is ok.
customer_reviews.author: OIS

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Brand new unbranded Blackberry Q10 I have used Blackberries in the past, but the new operating system Blackberry has takes giant steps forward. The OS on this device makes you feel like you are using the most current technology even in what is considered a classic form factor. Battery life is pretty good, not the best I've seen. Keyboard is rock solid. Screen is clear and the touch screen is very usable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexxxx Fair

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Verizon branded. No headphones or case included.
customer_reviews.text: As a BB 9900 and Ipod user, I clearly understand the evolution that leads to Q10. I like it, in spite of some difficulties in getting used to it. However, the phone I ordered from Amazon.com was a Verizon-branded equipment, with no headphones and no (leather) case included. This was not stated in the description. First time since 1998 that I buy a phone that comes in an original box and has no headphones. Unacceptable to me, especially knowing that friends who bought it elsewhere got great modern and improved headphones and a superb leather case.
customer_reviews.author: A+

customer_reviews.title: Confused!
customer_reviews.text: Based upon reviews and details I understood that I could simply place my existing Q10 SIM card in this phone. Unfortunately, the individuals I am calling receive a NO CALLER ID message. Other folks can't place calls in, I can't call out some times (blocked bc of NO CALLER ID - even at my office and doctor's office). At this point I'm past my 30 day return period - I didn't have time to attempt to fix prior. Hoped there was a fix - some sort of a SYNC. Anyone? Thoughts? Ideas?
customer_reviews.author: willham

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent investment if you are looking for a cellular phone ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent investment if you are looking for a cellular phone not for a computer or phablet, may be not a friendly one for operations but is just a matter to adapt to a new way of handling the features it has, nevertheless you feel a solid equipment in your hand at the same time it is small and light. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm hoping that BlackBerry stays afloat.
customer_reviews.text: I would hate to see this company dissolve; I hate touch screen phones with a passion but they're a necessary evil at this point. I love this phone! The Wall Street pundits alone will agree with me: keys, clarity, promptness. As far as the Amazon delivery: it took a couple of days for them to take the money out of my account but as soon as they did, delivery was lightning fast. Arrived at my house on a Sunday :)
customer_reviews.author: ArrGee

customer_reviews.title: Thank you the phone looked fantastic and brand new
customer_reviews.text: Thank you the phone looked fantastic and brand new. If it only wasn't for the one key not working, I would have given it 5 stars. Your customer service is excellent and highly rated since you were able to do refund my funds upon the return on the item.
customer_reviews.author: Avenging Annie

customer_reviews.title: Shipping errors Information is Blackberry Q10 Black 16GB Factory Unlocked ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping errors Information is Blackberry Q10 Black 16GB Factory Unlocked, International Version - 4G / LTE 3, 7, 8, 20 (1800/2600/900/800 MHz) (New), in fact, it is Verizon SQN100-2, LTE 13, 4 , CDMA 1xRTT / EVDO Rev A (800/1900 MHz), and, within the battery compartment, no blackberry security tags, printing fuzzy, suspected to be refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: wu junping

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone, it does everything, but ANSWER an incoming phone call! Always have to call them back. Has anybody else had an issue with this? Camera is fantastic, features and software fantastic, but clumsey for answering phone calls. Love that it has all the bands for the various carriers. Great little phone for what it does do. Size and keyboard are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: i am quite happy with the device it is a brand new phone as promised it was delivered in time to make the plane to the Bahamas and the user interface is great and it is very fast. To be honest the only issue i have is i ordered a phone according to the picture had no branding but i received a Verizon branded phone as you can see i have given five stars this is a great device.
customer_reviews.author: pleased customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Beast slayed Carrier "updates"
customer_reviews.text: Love this tiny Beast. Only draw back is that T-Mobile's "New" frequencies left me going back to my Android. NOT FOR USE WITH T -MOBILE.(At least in Michigan, USA)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all!
customer_reviews.text: I can only give one star because I love the keypad. Other than that, it's not at all what I expected. BB hardly has an apps, you have to use Amazon apps to get stuff, and it's a process. Google maps isn't an option and believe me, you don't want to rely on BB map app. 9 times out of 10 it can't find your location. Also, good luck with the Bluetooth. Horrible phone, I wish I could sell it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: The smartphone is great, a nice upgrade from my previous BlackBerry
customer_reviews.text: The smartphone is great, a nice upgrade from my previous BlackBerry. However, it is hard to learn all the features and options for this smartphone. Does not include a comprehensivwe manual, just a startup leaflet, and the online tutorials are not very good either. Weeks after delivery, I am still trying to find out about all the features. One problem seems to be a lack of apps for BlackBerry smartphones compared to IPhones and Galaxy phones.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Moyle

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: All around, it's an excellent phone; however, as a longtime loyal blackberry user, I'm disappointed with some notifications configuration options missing from BB7 and prior versions, namely, the inability to create groups of callers to share a dedicated set of ringtones for phone, email and text messages coming from such group, and not being able to set a number of times an email notifier should repeat upon receipt, as I've used different number of repetitions and tones for each of my mail accounts. Hopefully this will be corrected on a future software upgrade. Other than these issues, I really like this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto A Tohme

customer_reviews.title: Small, comfortable, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Working fast, super OS. It's so sad that not supported anymore. But I will use it until it breaks)
customer_reviews.author: Akhmed

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a fan of touch screen and I don't like change. Well
customer_reviews.text: I really did not want an I phone. I had my bold forever but it needed to retire. I'm not a fan of touch screen and I don't like change. Well.....the first day without a track pad sucked. And I kept getting stuck in whatever I opened . But this phone is logical. And I'm actually starting to like it. If you email, text and make calls this phone is perfect. It's like all bb's a great work phone. It takes a little time to feel comfortable with the hub. But if you are set on having buttons, it is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: maggie deangelo

customer_reviews.title: One of the best phones I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. If you like small and good phones and misses to write on QWERTY, it is a must-have for you. Too bad Blackberry and other app makers (liek Whatsapp) are killing support for BB10, but for sure it is a productive phone in case you aren't into apps.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Overheated
customer_reviews.text: Over heated and I cannot resell because it is problematic. Bot recommended
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was one of the best purchases i have made on amazon, i love this phone
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S in the south

customer_reviews.title: I remain with the Blackberry because of the real qwerty keyboard - which provides an easy way of typing up long emails - and jus
customer_reviews.text: In this day and age of Android smartphones and iPhones, I remain with the Blackberry because of the real qwerty keyboard - which provides an easy way of typing up long emails - and just the small great things about the Blackberry, like the fact you can start a call or an email or a note just with a press of one button, without having to tap to get to the right part of the interface. The price for all of this is high though, since so many useful applications are not available for Q10, like Viber, for example. Well, very few applications are made for BB these days anyways. And I'm still with this phone!
customer_reviews.author: PZ

customer_reviews.title: Does not receive data (no MMS) through ATT. After ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not receive data (no MMS) through ATT. After hours of troubleshooting personally and with ATT tech personnel solution was not found. Consequently, am forced to return and replace phone or purchase new elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Without retail box: isn't for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone, good experience of use. In my case, i received the phone in a generic box, without manuals and original charger/cable. Review the order.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando QR

customer_reviews.title: The phone worked great with all its features
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked great with all its features; however, I was never able to back up the contacts to my desktop. It never gave that option.
customer_reviews.author: hankq

customer_reviews.title: I left android to this phone and this is not a good welcome performance
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not working properly , when I write a message or anything keys "i" and "o" keep stick and block the phone for any other action , I need to reset it and then start again ; really bothers me ; I left android to this phone and this is not a good welcome performance. Sadly ; I brought the phone to my country and it is not a warranty to cover this failure here , or yes ??? We are in Venezuela
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: headphones and a good
customer_reviews.text: hello goodnight has finally reached my cell , first time I worry a lot that the box is not the original which normally come blackberrys and I 've had several , also brings me a manual itself but a very brief booklet , there is the headphones and today a friend friend casually buy one and if it came with original box, headphones and a good manual
customer_reviews.author: HITCH83

customer_reviews.title: It kind of felt like a downgrade at first
customer_reviews.text: It's a struggle moving from an android device to a blackberry. The blackberry isn't as good as it used to be 5 years ago. A lot has changed. Other than that, the phone is a good phone and everything works fine. Recommended for blackberry lovers and not so much for android lovers for it is a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDystopia

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern BlackBerry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little device. Sometimes I just couldn't put it down. Very modern and useful. Worked perfectly with T-Mobile LTE and WiFi Calling. No regrets at all. Get it for the Hotspot feature alone if you don't want to pay extra carrier fees for the feature.
customer_reviews.author: mister2d

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! What a great feel and nice look of it! It is a shame Blackberry lose it business at such a speed. New BB10 system is great, can run Android app directly if you need something badly.
customer_reviews.author: Nounen Rena

customer_reviews.title: The browser is not playing any of the videos from sites like Twitter, etc
customer_reviews.text: I am a BB guy, so this is difficult for me. I have been very frustrated with this device - the same one I had before. The browser is not playing any of the videos from sites like Twitter, etc.
customer_reviews.author: GoheadEd

customer_reviews.title: ... that I bought this phone and is been working great,
customer_reviews.text: It has been over a year that I bought this phone and is been working great,
customer_reviews.author: jose torres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST PHONE EVER! Love it, will miss it, wish I could hold on to it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Mila Baro

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL UNTIL NOW
customer_reviews.text: THE CABLE COME WITHOUT PROBLEMS, WORKS WELL ON KENWOOD BIT 901, IS A GENERIC CABLE BUT WORKS WELL, AND HAVE THE CORRECT SIZE, THE ONLY PROBLEM IS KENWOOD, THEY HAVE TO IMPROVE THE BACK AREA OF HIS STEREOS CARS.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Nice mix of keys and touch screen
customer_reviews.text: What I like about it is the keyboard. Tried a few others like Apple and Samsung smart phones, but really missed the keyboard. The touchscreen works well, but sometimes is a bit "touchy" so you pull screens that you did not intend to pull. Overall very functional. And I noticed the higher capacity of the processor and internal memory.
customer_reviews.author: W. Frohn

customer_reviews.title: The most difficult phone to do what you want it ...
customer_reviews.text: The most difficult phone to do what you want it to do. Tap the open and if it opens the first time, lucky me. Navigating is almost impossible. Get into the contacts and I can't get out without shutting down the phone. Not at all what I was expecting. I had my Curve for over 5 yrs without any trouble, except for having to change the battery. The reason I changed, I wanted a big screen. Not worth the money or the time.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the phone.
customer_reviews.text: i really love the phone however i do not care for the app store on this phone, i would not buy this phone if you love apps as you can not even download facebook,snapchat.
customer_reviews.author: Guynns

customer_reviews.title: I like this.
customer_reviews.text: Verizon version but 4G for Tmobile too and even Rogers. I like this.
customer_reviews.author: Little Bear

customer_reviews.title: Had it a couple weeks now and working great, came unlocked to use in the carribbean
customer_reviews.text: Minus the booklet and earphones that's did come with the phone my friend loves his new phone. Had it a couple weeks now and working great, came unlocked to use in the carribbean.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Phone died!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Dad. It worked ok for a few months and then started getting hot and shutting off on him. Now, when we try turning it on the screen stays black and red light stays on but nothing happens. Wish I would have bought something different!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Howard

customer_reviews.title: SQN100-1
customer_reviews.text: It's AT&T branded, but it is unlocked. I'm using it with a T-Mobile sim card. I get 4G LTE in my area. It's so nice having an actual, physical keyboard again, which is very responsive. It's an SQN100-1 model.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good phone
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good phone. The interface, especially for hardcore blackberry users, is not very user-friendly... but one grows accustomed over time. Call quality was ok. Nothing like the older BBs (like the bold etc.). OS10 has a lot of potential IMHO
customer_reviews.author: Corey Springer

customer_reviews.title: Not fully satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: Though the key pad is great, the phone lacks speed. Comparing to the good old Curve that I own,this one has disappointed me. The initial booting is very slow. There are many layers that the OS has to pass through before opening its eyes wide open. I found it a bit too wide to operate by one hand. The touch screen seems rather too sensitive, making it hard to avoid inadvertent activation of applications and calls. I expected a better upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: AbhinavG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent excellent phone, very practical, very fast modern yy. From all points of view is excellent I recommend it to anyone interested in purchasing it
customer_reviews.author: Elio Dommar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: May be old fashioned, but still does all I need.
customer_reviews.author: BSB

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry Q10
customer_reviews.text: Phone worked trouble with the battery that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone. It's really unlocked for use in other ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice Phone. It's really unlocked for use in other countries with other providers. I'm currently using it in Suriname, South America.
customer_reviews.author: Vijata D.

customer_reviews.title: Q10
customer_reviews.text: Perfect SMARTphone. You can easily handle daily business with it. It is solid and crafted very well. The phone itself is really cool and unique compared to its competitors (Apple, Samsung, Sony). The keyboard works better than any touch could ever do in my opinion. The only downside is the app store of BlackBerry. There is great room for improvement. Nevertheless I can totally recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Spot on! Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She loves it! It is so much better than she had expected it to be

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice device; user friendly and I can still use a regular keyboard rather than a virtual one!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Underrated phone. Solid and dependable - a solid workhorse
customer_reviews.text: One of the most underrated smartphones on the market today. Even a year after its initial release, it is still easily one of the most productive smartphones period. It's a shame that they did not release this a year earlier. This phone works great. I receive 4G LTE connections on T-Mobile perfectly and look forward to using this phone abroad as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone is really good. Excellent condition, took a couple of days before shipment but was delivered on date stated. All gadgets came with the phone and it works well no scratches on phone
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard condition is very bad.
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard condition is very bad. Some buttons can't be pressed.

customer_reviews.title: This particular model does not get LTE for T-Mobile USA
customer_reviews.text: If you are on T-Mobile or Metro PCS you will not get LTE speeds. The dual Arabic English keyboard is also a little frustrating if you only know english.

I'm switching to apple even though blackberry q10 is a valid phone,unfortunately not for me. think twince if you want to buy it online and ask as many questions as possible. be aware of the limitations that s smaller screen has and its app store.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: very good this blackberry phone q10, fast and with a friendly interface that makes operation simple, I recommend your system bb10

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected love!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed! Stuck with Blackberry for the keyboard and didn't expect to love the Q10-but I do! Flows smoothly from one task to another, clear, easy, beautiful. Still trying to figure out the docs to go, but will need to take some time for that. Wish it could print straight from phone!

customer_reviews.title: the phone is good, came with the especifications ok

customer_reviews.title: Solid Phone
customer_reviews.text: Q10 is a great phone. Does everything I need it to do for work and some play. I have been very happy with its performance so far.

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone is user friendly and attractive with a nice, solid (even elegant) feel to it when I use it. Add an Otter Box case and you got it made.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good stuff, excellent customer service with very nice attitude, I would definitely recommend it

customer_reviews.text: I can't use twitter.... very important to me..... I've been trying to log in and it's been impossible..... Very frustating for me, because in my old Bberry I didn't have that problem... Hello, the problem is solved... Twitter works perfectly fine in my Q10... Since I'm new with 10 system the more I use it, the more I learn how it works...

customer_reviews.text: Very good is product telephone is conditionet perfect is shipin is good time

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Looking Phone
customer_reviews.text: Joycells, Thank you very much for the prompt delivery, this was ordered on June 6, 2014, and I received it on June 9, 2014. The cellphone is in the original package brand New and everything is intact. I have not done anything with it yet because this is a gift. Overall, am very happy with the presentation.

product_meta.title: Blackberry Q10 Unlocked Cellphone, 16GB, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe BlackBerry Q10 follows the footsteps of many legacy smartphone featuring a 3.1 touchscreen, QWERTY, and its fancy Glass material.
feature_bullets: 3.1" Super AMOLED Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen + Full Physical QWERTY keyboard
BlackBerry 10 (upgradable), Dual-Core 1.5 GHz Krait Processor, Chipset: Snapdragon S4, Adreno 225 Graphics
8 Megapixel Camera with Autofocus & LED Flash + Front-Facing 2 Megapixel Camera
Internal Memory: 16GB, 2GB RAM + microSD Slot Expandable up to 64GB

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,172 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
